f47b1382-129a-4c1d-8dc6-3b53109e25f1.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Digital Academy. The course program consists of five modules run over the course of six months where participants gain an understanding of how digital transformation is impacting FMCG, how this offers both challenges and opportunities, and the new widened toolbox enabled by digital.
f47b1382-129a-4c1d-8dc6-3b53109e25f1.name: Orkla Digital Academy Fundamental Program

badge_template_activities.title: All mandatory activities completed

9a68d206-a5a7-447a-8d7d-d2726848f975.description: Earners of this badge have passed our fundamental leadership program designed to develop leaders who can create value by working with and through others and in accordance with Orkla's Core Values. During the 4-months-long program, participants are provided with practical tools and methods that they apply straight away in their daily work as compulsory assignments both in lab groups and individually.
9a68d206-a5a7-447a-8d7d-d2726848f975.name: Orkla Leadership Compass

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Orkla Leadership Compass
Complete 100% of the leadership assignments in the learning platform Promote

4b5d7806-e975-462d-84a0-7fb8b27736d9.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Digital Academy Marketing Program. The course is an add-on to the Orkla Digital Academy Fundamental Program and runs over the course of three months. It consists of modules covering the most important topics related to digital marketing and succeeding with marketing in a digital age.
4b5d7806-e975-462d-84a0-7fb8b27736d9.name: Orkla Digital Academy Marketing Deep Dive Program

badge_template_activities.title: All mandatory activities completed

98b959d7-9051-46b4-9eec-bfa77aba6b79.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Digital Academy Sales Program. The course is an add-on to the Orkla Digital Academy Fundamental Program and runs over the course of three months. It consists of modules covering the most important topics related to digital sales and succeeding with sales in a digital age.
98b959d7-9051-46b4-9eec-bfa77aba6b79.name: Orkla Digital Academy Sales Deep Dive Program

badge_template_activities.title: All mandatory activities completed

c1062b19-265f-4f25-99c1-0eddf29605e4.description: Earners of this badge have passed our 6-months long NRM Awareness module designed to develop Sales Leaders who can identify growth and value creation opportunities based on Strategic Category Context and periodic analysis of the 4 NRM levers with customers. To ensure mutual value creation and profitable growth, one will learn to effectively align goals, strategies, and action plans between the two partners.
c1062b19-265f-4f25-99c1-0eddf29605e4.name: Orkla NRM Awareness

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of NRM Awareness
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

2d410c1d-7cc4-4512-9782-19f080e16df7.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Brand & Innovation Fundamental Course. The course is virtual and consists of five modules, focusing on best practices within marketing & innovation. The learning modules are a mix of self-studies, presentations, and assignments. This is a great way to learn about Orkla's core marketing tools, creating value through customer insight, brand building, communication, packaging design, and innovation.
2d410c1d-7cc4-4512-9782-19f080e16df7.name: Orkla Brand & Innovation Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual course consisting of 5 modules with a mix of self-study, presentations and assignments
You have to complete 10 hours of self-study, attend the seminars, and complete the given assignments

3fa36e86-95be-423c-9cd9-96fd0f014cab.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Brand Academy. The academy is focusing on the key value-creating processes in Marketing & Innovation. Participants are provided with practical tools and templates beyond learning from International and Orkla best practice approaches within Brand Positioning, Innovation & Consumer Insight, Packaging & Brand Design, and Communication & Media. The program also secures experience in applying these tools, working on real-life cases.
3fa36e86-95be-423c-9cd9-96fd0f014cab.name: Orkla Brand Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Attended all four modules and completed all coursework
Complete E-learning modules, pre-work, and 11 full days of classroom training

59711480-0e41-4b86-bd80-9164c28274ba.description: Earners of this badge have passed our Global Leadership Program designed to mid-level managers who want to learn more about themselves as a leader, how to run their business, manage their energy levels, and create a committed and high-performing team. Participants are provided with practical tools and methods that they apply in their daily work, in addition to inspiration sessions with Orkla Executives. The program is designed and delivered in collaboration with Implement Consulting Group.
59711480-0e41-4b86-bd80-9164c28274ba.name: Orkla Management Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Summits part of Orkla Management Program
Complete 100% of the leadership assignments in the learning platform Promote

fe90fcd0-57a4-4117-a4c3-83b301e655e1.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Digital Academy. The course program consists of four modules run over the course of three months where participants gain an understanding of how digital transformation is impacting FMCG, how this offers both challenges and opportunities, and the new widened toolbox enabled by digital.
fe90fcd0-57a4-4117-a4c3-83b301e655e1.name: Orkla Digital Academy Executive Program

badge_template_activities.title: All mandatory activities completed

ef5eb455-0274-42e6-897f-396f23ba5fca.description: The program is for Orkla Executives and other strategic leaders who are part of an Orkla management team. The focus is on leadership skills that will create sustainable growth, drive strategic change and elevate performance. The participants share best practices and support each other in finding ways to strengthen the execution of their business plans. The program is delivered by IMD Business School and tailormade Orkla’s specific business realties and aspirations.
ef5eb455-0274-42e6-897f-396f23ba5fca.name: Orkla Strategic Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and complete all of the online training modules including the required assignments.
Participate in the 4 days long face-to-face learning program at IMD Business School.

7e1428c7-9231-4148-927e-36b7e88f9e77.description: The KAM Essentials module is designed to develop Sales Leaders who can apply the Orkla Sales competencies to improve customer cooperation and performance with multifunctional preparations, customer contact meetings, and follow-up sessions. Participants are provided with practical tools and methods that they apply straight away in their daily work as compulsory assignments both in peer groups and individually.
7e1428c7-9231-4148-927e-36b7e88f9e77.name: Orkla KAM Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of KAM Essentials
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

2d214ab2-5f63-486a-8963-53f733bd31fa.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Summer Internship Program. During the 2-months-long program, the students have participated in projects related to their field of expertise within different business units, as well as comprehensive group work and case competition concerning sustainability and change. The focus of the internship is to enhance practical experience and to expand and strengthen knowledge linked to their education and skills.
2d214ab2-5f63-486a-8963-53f733bd31fa.name: Orkla Summer Internship Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attend obligatory classes and courses, including case work
Finish the Summer Internship Program

b7a5fda7-e913-4128-8c80-222ae1f7e56a.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Procurement Academy, meaning that they have built strong capabilities in and understanding of end-to-end sourcing, sustainability, revenue management and innovation. In addition, the participants have gained new skills in Stakeholder-, Project- and Change Management and practiced/shared experiences in real-life case projects.
b7a5fda7-e913-4128-8c80-222ae1f7e56a.name: Orkla Procurement Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and complete common sessions, workshops, coaching and groupwork
Complete all mandatory activities part of the academy

dd739627-4411-4b72-8e04-c0086400b797.description: Earners of this badge have passed our 4-months Strategic Customer Planning module designed to develop Sales Leaders who can VUCA trends and category context as starting point of the annual Strategic Customer Planning. One will learn how to apply customer and shopper insights in the value proposition and identify growth opportunities that create value for customers.
dd739627-4411-4b72-8e04-c0086400b797.name: Orkla Strategic Customer Planning

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Strategic Customer Planning
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform

18c25f77-4f79-431d-90cd-570e31fe3367.description: Earners of this badge have passed our leadership program designed to develop leadership skills and fundamental business competencies for OFI next generation leaders. During the 14-month long program, participants are provided with theory, practical tools and methods that they can apply in real-life projects and / or in their daily activities as compulsory assignments performed individually, in pairs or groups.
18c25f77-4f79-431d-90cd-570e31fe3367.name: OFI Emerging Leaders Program

badge_template_activities.title: Complete at least 95% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote (both ELP and OLC elements)

da268687-52b9-48b0-8b90-a911166b4564.description: The Field Force Management module is designed to develop Sales Leaders who can apply the Orkla Sales Competencies to improve Field Sales Return On Investment by designing a data-driven sales organization and utilizing Net Revenue Management levers on the store level. Participants are provided with practical tools and methods such as for example RAC-plan and coaching that they apply straight away in their daily work as compulsory assignments both in peer groups and individually.
da268687-52b9-48b0-8b90-a911166b4564.name: Orkla Field Force Management

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Field Force Management
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

c9ed19bf-0a78-422c-97e2-5978023a28ed.description: The Junior Advisory Board focuses on bringing insight, values and input on strategic discussions, emerging trends or other relevant topics addressed and presented by supporting team, or chosen by the Junior Advisory Board themselves. They have solved challenges divided in groups, presented insight and suggestion to relevant top managers, and founded an aspiring network of young Orkla ambassadors.
c9ed19bf-0a78-422c-97e2-5978023a28ed.name: Orkla Junior Board 2020-2022

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have been a part of the Junior Advisory Board for the President & CEO of Orkla ASA and top managers across functions and Business Areas in Orkla. They have been a part of the board for 18 months.

5a07e601-4308-48ff-abc0-ce507a7af122.description: Earners of this badge have passed our Sales Strategy and Coaching module designed to develop Sales Leaders, who can drive growth with our playing2win methodology! During the 4-months long program, participants are provided with practical tools and methods that they apply in their daily work as compulsory assignments both in peer groups and individually.
5a07e601-4308-48ff-abc0-ce507a7af122.name: Orkla Sales Strategy and Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Sales Strategy & Coaching

5be9f5c8-12f3-4ef8-b093-4d0f43d07f89.description: Earners of this badge have passed our 4-months Selling Essentials module designed to develop Sales Leaders who can use the O.R.K.L.A Selling methodology and S.H.A.R.K. Objection handling in the selling process. Explores growth opportunities that create value for your customers and uses (individual business) planning skills for every internal and external meeting.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Selling Essentials

3131568b-de7e-423a-94d2-4c880155651d.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Brand Academy Intensive Program. The academy is focusing on the key value-creating processes in Marketing & Innovation. Participants are provided with practical tools and templates beyond learning from International and Orkla best practice approaches within the following subjects: How brands grow, Consumer Insight, Building the concept and Planning for effective communication.
3131568b-de7e-423a-94d2-4c880155651d.name: Orkla Brand Academy Intensive Program

badge_template_activities.title: Completed full course

7dddb2f8-1332-4e74-ba2c-68e9f981a441.description: Earners of this badge have passed our Strategic Negotiations course designed to develop Sales Leaders who can apply the Negotiation process knowledge to identify multi-level customer negotiation styles and processes. Participants learn to manage and coach team members during negotiations and advise management on intelligent complex negotiation. Additionally, they will learn to apply P&L skills to visualize the business drivers during the negotiation process.
7dddb2f8-1332-4e74-ba2c-68e9f981a441.name: Orkla Strategic Negotiations

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Strategic Negotiations
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

68ca68f2-5e52-4183-a005-2f1f2efdb127.description: Earners of this badge have passed our Negotiation module designed to develop Sales Leaders, who can apply the negotiation process knowledge to identify client negotiation style and process. The participants will gain the ability to manage internal and external stakeholders during the process and use P&L skills to visualize the business drivers and P&L implications during the negotiation process.
68ca68f2-5e52-4183-a005-2f1f2efdb127.name: Orkla Negotiation Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Negotiation Essentials
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

4eb4a273-b0d7-45be-9e5b-f8d70c8b2fb9.description: Earners of this badge have passed our 4-months Strategic Selling module designed to develop Sales Leaders who can use O.R.K.L.A selling methodology to identify how customers make strategic choices during the budgeting process. One will learn how to use Customer Engagement skills to ‘’pre-work’’ on customer long-term strategic planning before starting the budget process. Participants will learn to set the extended category/customer context as a starting point for mutual value creation.
4eb4a273-b0d7-45be-9e5b-f8d70c8b2fb9.name: Orkla Strategic Selling

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Live Sessions part of Strategic Selling
Complete 100% of the assignments in the learning platform Promote

d589e76b-28a6-4995-8df6-22e3e532fef3.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Orkla Sustainability Academy. This digital course is an introduction to the wide and often complex area of sustainability. The Orkla sustainability strategy is the foundation and particpants will reflect on how they can contribute to the targets in their daily job. Internal and external perspectives are covered, and along the way inspirational cases are presented. Also included are Sustainability communication and what it takes to drive real change.
d589e76b-28a6-4995-8df6-22e3e532fef3.name: Orkla Sustainability Academy

badge_template_activities.title: 100% completion of e-learning programme (estimated 20 hours)

383f47e4-cc63-4b5a-9149-8bcaab766501.description: Earners of this badge have completed the Short version of the Orkla Sustainability Academy. This digital course is an introduction to the wide and often complex area of sustainability. The Orkla sustainability strategy is the foundation and along they way inspirational cases are presented. The course provides essential sustainability knowledge relevant for all business functions, and an increased understanding of the personal contribution towards our targets.
383f47e4-cc63-4b5a-9149-8bcaab766501.name: Orkla Sustainability Academy - Short version

badge_template_activities.title: 100% completion of e-learning programme (estimated 5 hours)
